nodes.text: The Gran Protectorate Act was an act passed by the Galactic Senate of the Galactic Republic following the violent colonization of the planet Malastare by the Gran species. The act allowed the Gran to settle on the planet's eastern continent, resulting in them forcing members of the world's native Dug species onto the western continent.

The Gran Protectorate Act was first mentioned in the 2016 Star Wars Roleplaying supplement Special Modifications, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games. The act originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which was written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
